page.title: 11 PRESTATYN WEEKLY
page.content: We visited the{Prestatyn}office of the {Rhyl Journal & Prestatyn Weekly}where we were told the stories making the news in{Prestatyn}during May/June 1985.The main story was the development of{Prestatyn's Royal Lido, now some 50 years old & being one of Prestatyn's main holiday attractions. It is proposed to spend up to Â£2 million on it to bring it up to date.Secondly,the problem of the sea defences is being studied,in the hope of preventing a recurrence of the flooding of a few years ago.Other stories from the area are the development of the old town rubbish tip into a park area and the improvement of Prestatyn's High Street.Finally the development of the Roman archaelogical dig, off Melyd Ave has been a story of wide interest.
